img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(3\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4d/Five_Skandhas_%283%29.png)
You can collect the Skandha of Thought in Chapter 3 when you reach the Mindfulness Cliff Keeper's Shrine. To the right of the shrine, there's a large canyon, and there's actually a path below that you can drop down onto.
img_below_text:
Jump down there and follow the cave system, until you're back outside, then continue up the stairs and along the path. Turn right and head through the corridor to emerge on another cliff that's covered in snow.
![Five Skandhas \(4\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/32/Five_Skandhas_%284%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 6 from the file 'How_to_Find_the_Five_Skandhas_and_Unlock_a_Secret_Boss_.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Five Skandhas \(3\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4d/Five_Skandhas_%283%29.png)
You can collect the Skandha of Thought in Chapter 3 when you reach the Mindfulness Cliff Keeper's Shrine. To the right of the shrine, there's a large canyon, and there's actually a path below that you can drop down onto."
            - Following Text: "Jump down there and follow the cave system, until you're back outside, then continue up the stairs and along the path. Turn right and head through the corridor to emerge on another cliff that's covered in snow.
![Five Skandhas \(4\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/32/Five_Skandhas_%284%29.png)"

            Your task:

            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character navigating a rocky, snow-covered pathway emerging from a cave. This area appears to be part of the route described in the preceding and following text, where the player explores a cave system and transitions to an outdoor snowy cliff. The image visually supports the narrative progression of finding the Skandha of Thought in Chapter 3, guiding players through the environment toward the next objective.
